thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location very comfortable
thread.title_full: Great location very comfortable - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PETER B
title: Great location very comfortable
text:
Stayed in our usual London spot
Great location for museums Harrods and parks
Right by Gloucester Road tube station for everywhere else
We got upgraded to a nice 2 level suite
Concierge very helpful.
Got an early chec in 7 am
Staff friendly and efficient
Nice and quiet
